alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 7:33AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Bands of snow to develop across portions of southern Lander/Eureka county this morning... Bands of moderate snow showers will continue to develop across portions of southern Lander/Eureka counties this morning. Automated weather sensors are showing low visibility along SR278 at this time. Look for off and on snow showers to continue for the next several hours with rapidly changing visibility along portions of US Highway 50, SR278 and 306 through these areas. Little to no accumulation is expected. If driving this morning, please use caution as these snow showers could produce varying levels of driving conditions. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
